name: Homegear::loadModule
description: This method loads a Homegear module from the module directory (/var/lib/homegear/modules by default).

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename of the module to be loaded

returnValue: It returns "0" if successful and "1" if the module has already been loaded.

errors.description: A module with the provided filename does not exist.
Device family initialization was not successful
